ygData.subject: Re: I think I have a good idea.
ygData.msgSnippet: manastone.. converts hp to mana.. not much, but it s about all we have right now Fetko, 34 wizzie, mith marr ... From: Mike Calhoun  To: EQ
ygData.messageBody:
manastone.. converts hp to mana.. not much, but it's about all we have right
now

Fetko, 34 wizzie, mith marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Mike Calhoun <ninxf@...>
To: EQ <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 11:25 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] I think I have a good idea.


> From: Mike Calhoun <ninxf@...>
>
> I thinking today about how this mana thing could be settled. I came up
> with two ideas besides us getting more mana points. Other RPG's like
> Final Fantasy, they have potions that restore some mana. What if we
> were to have something like that. Like a kind of mana potion or
> something. Then we would be more useful in groups, less meditating
> time, and we would be able to fight solo....First root when getting low
> on mana then bandage and cast. The second idea that I had was a item or
> piece of equipment (or many items and pieces of equipment) that would
> quicken the meditating process. Like a staff that would make our mana go
> up 20% faster or whatever.
>
> Kodros
> Server of Prexus
>
>
